original_text: Then a Syrian soldier shot an arrow into the air. He did not try to shoot at anyone, but the arrow hit the king of Israel. The arrow went through a space in the king's armour. The king commanded the man who drove his chariot, ‘Turn the chariot around. Take me away from the battle. An arrow has hit me.’
korean_text: 한 사람이 무심코 활을 당겨 이스라엘 왕의 갑옷 솔기를 쏜지라 왕이 그의 병거 모는 자에게 이르되 내가 부상하였으니 네 손을 돌려 나를 진중에서 나가게 하라 하였으나

sentences.original_text: Then a Syrian soldier shot an arrow into the air.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 한 시리아 군인이 공중으로 화살을 쏘았습니다.

sentences.original_text: He did not try to shoot at anyone,
but the arrow hit the king of Israel.
The arrow went through a space in the king's armour.
The king commanded the man who drove his chariot,
Take me away from the battle.
